entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 06:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
